alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 29 at 9:41PM EDT until October 01 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Connecticut... Housatonic River At Gaylordsville affecting Litchfield County. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Gaylordsville. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Sunday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EDT Friday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 8.6 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Gaylordsville Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Fri 9 pm: 7.6 Forecast: Sat 2 am 8.1 Sat 8 am 8.5 Sat 2 pm 8.6 Sat 8 pm 8.5 Sun 2 am 8.2 Sun 8 am 7.9 Sun 2 pm 7.6 Sun 8 pm 7.3 Mon 2 am 7.0 Mon 8 am 6.7 Mon 2 pm 6.5 &&
